text: King of the Hill is an American animated television series created by Mike Judge and Greg Daniels. The series focuses on the Hills, a middle-class American family in the fictional city of Arlen, Texas. It originally aired on Fox from January 12, 1997 to September 13, 2009; with four episodes from the final season premiering in syndication from May 3 to May 6, 2010. A total of 259 episodes aired over the course of 13 seasons. == Series overview == Season Episodes Originally aired First aired Last aired 1 12 January 12, 1997 May 11, 1997 2 23 September 21, 1997 May 17, 1998 3 25 September 15, 1998 May 18, 1999 4 24 September 26, 1999 May 21, 2000 5 20 October 1, 2000 May 13, 2001 6 22 November 11, 2001 May 12, 2002 7 23 November 3, 2002 May 18, 2003 8 22 November 2, 2003 May 23, 2004 9 15 November 7, 2004 July 10, 2005 10 9 September 18, 2005 March 26, 2006 11 18 November 5, 2006 May 20, 2007 12 22 September 23, 2007 May 18, 2008 13 24 September 28, 2008 May 6, 2010 == Other websites == * * King of the Hill at the Big Cartoon DataBase Category:Lists of animated television series episodes
